import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "../home/Navbar.css"; import "./Card.css"; import "./User.css"; import "./ProgressCircle.css"; import "./Order.css"; function Profile() { const handleLogout = () => { window.location.href = 'http://localhost:3000/login'; }; const products = [ { id: 1, name: 'Ürün 1', stock: 100, price: '$10', image: require('../assets/minecraft.jpeg') }, { id: 2, name: 'Ürün 2', stock: 50, price: '$20', image: require('../assets/minecraft.jpeg') }, { id: 3, name: 'Ürün 3', stock: 200, price: '$15', image: require('../assets/minecraft.jpeg') }, // Daha fazla ürün ekleyebilirsiniz ]; const [quantities, setQuantities] = useState(products.map(() => 1)); const handleQuantityChange = (index, value) => { const newQuantities = [...quantities]; newQuantities[index] = value; setQuantities(newQuantities); }; return (
